price: Kuma kada ku kashe rai wanda Allah Ya haramta fãce da haƙƙi, kuma wanda aka kashe, yanã wanda aka zãlunta to, haƙĩƙa Mun sanya hujja ga waliyyinsa, sai dai kada ya ƙẽtare haddi a cikin kashẽwar. Lalle shĩ ya kasance wanda ake taimako.
arabic: وَلَا تَقۡتُلُواْ ٱلنَّفۡسَ ٱلَّتِي حَرَّمَ ٱللَّهُ إِلَّا بِٱلۡحَقِّۗ وَمَن قُتِلَ مَظۡلُومٗا فَقَدۡ جَعَلۡنَا لِوَلِيِّهِۦ سُلۡطَٰنٗا فَلَا يُسۡرِف فِّي ٱلۡقَتۡلِۖ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ مَنصُورٗا

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walā taqtulū al-nafsa allatī ḥarrama al-lahu illā bil-ḥaqi waman qutila maẓlūman faqad jaʿalnā liwaliyyihi sul'ṭānan falā yus'rif fī al-qatli innahu kāna manṣūran
